t: The Beach Boys Vinyl Records — Dutch Vinyl Record Store
s: The Beach Boys are an American rock band, formed in Hawthorne, California in 1961. The group’s original lineup consisted of brothers Brian, Dennis, and Carl Wilson, their cousin Mike Love, and their friend Al Jardine. The Beach Boys are one of the most iconic and influential groups of all time.
